revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Intel «Jefferson Peak» Companion RF Module |caption2 = |pp = https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/products/wireless/wireless-products/dual-band-wireless-ac-9560.html |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = Dual Band Wireless-AC 9560 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = 9560NGW |page_start_date = 07/26/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_Dual_Band_Wireless-AC_9560_(9560NGW) |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = M.2 |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = M.2 (CNVio) |formfactor = 2230 |vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = a370 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 0034 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PD99560NG, MSQ9560NG, HLZ9560NG |icid = 1000M-9560NG |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:1C:BF,94:B8:6D, |chip1 = Intel;Pulsar; |chip2 = Intel;L716NA02;L716NA02, Q B3; |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = [https://wireless.wiki.kernel.org/en/users/drivers/iwlwifi iwlwifi] |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, VHT160, DFS, Bluetooth 5.0, CNVio, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/25/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B07G42J6KQ |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "PB#: J47195-001" is silkscreened on the back of the card in the FCC photos. {{FCC ST|01/21/2018|indexme.}} *Host Interfaces Wi-Fi: PCI based (Internal to the SoC) *Interfaces to the SoC Wi-Fi: CNVio (Intel propietary bus :inspired by the DPHY low power interface) *Intel corrected errors in CNVio trace numbers on M.2 2230 :(pins 21 and 23 swapped) on April 2017 ===Warning=== It is ''NOT'' a regular WiFi card, but just a dumb ''"Companion RF module"'', to Gemini Lake :"Pulsar" CNVi IP-core. So it Is ''NOT'' backward-compatible in the all senses. «Jefferson Peak» is an implementation of "Companion RF module" for AC-9560. :Description of "Pulsar" and CNVi overall idea: [https://en.wikichip.org/wiki/intel/cnvi CNVi] • [https://fccid.io/MSQ9560NG/User-Manual/9560NGW-User-Manual-3645263.pdf Details] ===HW features Requirements=== As it not a regular WiFi card it has as additional HW requirement :to support ''Pulsar'' IP-core. Following [[Intel]] SoC devices include ''Pulsar'': :- ''Cannon Lake'' PCH-LP :- ''Cannon Lake'' PCH-H :- ''Gemini Lake'' [https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/support/articles/000026155/network-and-i-o/wireless-networking.html Integrated Intel Wireless-AC (CNVi) and Companion RF (CRF) Module] :9560NGW - M.2 2230 (CNVi) / 9560D2W - SD 1216 (Solder Down) *8th Gen Intel Core processors ([https://www.pcworld.com/article/3266297/components-processors/intel-coffee-lake-8th-gen-core-desktop-cpus-chipsets.html ''Coffee Lake'']) *Intel Celeron processors based on ''Gemini Lake'' *Intel Pentium Silver processors based on ''Gemini Lake'' ==Links of Interest== ===Models=== :[https://epictech.ru/intel-300-series-chipset/ Intel 300 series chipset: '''H370/B360/H310/Q370'''] • [https://www.pcworld.com/article/3268063/components-processors/intel-motherboard-z370-vs-h370-vs-b360-vs-h310-8th-gen-cpu.html On '''PC|World'''] *ASUS TUF H370-PRO GAMING (Wi-Fi) Motherboard • [https://www.asus.com/Motherboards/TUF-H370-PRO-GAMING-WI-FI/ PPage] *ASUS TUF B360-PRO GAMING (Wi-Fi) Motherboard • [https://www.asus.com/Motherboards/TUF-B360-PRO-GAMING-WI-FI/ PPage] *[https://www.linux.org.ru/forum/linux-hardware/14818925 ASUS FX504GD] Notebook • ''Cannon Lake'' • ([[8086]]:a370/[[8086]]:0034) 
Network controller [0280]: Intel Corporation Wireless-AC 9560 
 [Jefferson Peak] [8086:a370] (rev 10)
Subsystem: Intel Corporation Wireless-AC 9560 [Jefferson Peak] 
 [8086:0034]

 % uname -rv
4.19.0-2-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.19.16-1 (2019-01-17)
 % networkctl status wlo1 
● 4: wlo1
       Link File: /usr/lib/systemd/network/99-default.link
    Network File: n/a
            Type: wlan
           State: routable (unmanaged)
            Path: pci-0000:00:14.3
          Driver: iwlwifi
          Vendor: Intel Corporation
           Model: Wireless-AC 9560 [Jefferson Peak]
      HW Address: 00:1c:bf:fc:12:34 (Intel Corporate)
